item.title: Two new wallets have already accumulated $3.8824 billion worth of ETH.
item.description: On July 24th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, two new wallets are in the process of accumulating ETH. These include:· The wallet with the address 0x3dF received 87,275 ETH from the Galaxy OTC market, with a value of $3.2681 billion.· The wallet with the address 0x286 received 16,472 ETH from FalconX, with a value of $61.43 million.

item.title: The Celestia Foundation has purchased the remaining TIA held by Polychain for $62.5 million, to be transferred to new investors.
item.description: On July 24th, Celestia tweeted that "The Celestia Foundation is collaborating with Polychain Capital to transfer all the remaining TIA tokens held by Polychain to new investors."This month, the foundation purchased 43,451,616.09 TIA tokens from Polychain Capital at a cost of $62.5 million. In order to complete this transaction, Polychain will soon release its entire TIA holdings from staking.To ensure the financial stability of the foundation, it is finalizing the distribution of TIA to the new investors. These transactions will follow a staggered unlocking mechanism, with the initial unlocking starting on August 16th and ending on November 14th.

item.title: TON Foundation and Kingsway Capital plan to raise $400 million for the Toncoin Treasury.
item.description: On July 24th, as per Bloomberg, the TON Foundation and Kingsway Capital are set to raise $4 billion for the Toncoin Treasury.

item.title: BONK Announces Burning of 500 Billion BONK Tokens, Equivalent to Approximately $18.62 Million
item.description: On July 24th, the Meme project BONK tweeted that, according to the fees generated by the Letsbonk.Fun platform, a total of 500 billion BONK (equivalent to 18.62 million USD) had just been burned.

item.title: Hyperliquid Whale Watch: Market Volatility, Multiple Whale Accounts Reducing Long Positions, Increasing Short Positions
item.description: On July 24th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight accessible at https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/NTOD, the cryptocurrency market witnessed a short-term volatility. There were changes in the Hyperliquid contract positions of whales. Some whales reduced their long positions and increased their short positions:The whale with the address beginning with 0x20c2d increased its ETH short position by approximately $970,000. The current unrealized loss is about $21.56 million, and the current liquidation price is around $4,899.The whale with the address starting with 0x469e9 reduced its ETH long position by 1,419 coins. The current unrealized gain is approximately $149,600, and the current liquidation price is $2,701.The whale with the address starting with 0x2ba55 reduced its ETH long position by 1,550 coins. The current unrealized gain is approximately $4.05 million, and the current liquidation price is $1,755.The whale with the address starting with 0x880ac increased its ETH short

item.title: LD Capital Founder Jack Yi: ETH's Strength is Nearing the End of Its Rally
item.description: On July 24th, Jack Yi, the founder of LD Capital, posted on social media, saying, "The strong upward momentum of ETH is approaching the end of consolidation. Originally, this was a major resistance level at which many OGs collectively exited their positions. In a bull market trend, regardless of any FUD, it is advisable to avoid shorting and try not to engage in short selling. Adhere to the trend and investment principles."

item.title: Solana has released the "Internet Capital Markets" roadmap, focusing on application-driven execution.
item.description: On July 24th, the Solana Foundation disclosed the "Internet Capital Markets" roadmap. This roadmap was jointly authored by team members from the Solana Foundation, Anza, Jito Labs, DoubleZero, Drift, and Multicoin Capital, with application control execution serving as its core. The roadmap outlined six key trade-offs: the balance between Privacy and Transparency, the contrast between Throttling and Unthrottled Transactions, the trade-offs among Inclusivity, Finality, and Latency, the choice between Hosted and Geographically Distributed, the difference between Maker-First and Taker-First Priority, and the trade-off between Flexibility and Opinionated Architecture.In the short term, the Jito Labs team announced on Monday its Blockchain Assembly Market (BAM). BAM is a "transaction processing system" that provides powerful new tools for Solana validators, traders, and applications to enhance performance. BAM is set to launch at the end of this month, aiming to bring privacy and transpare

item.title: Strategy intends to increase the fundraising amount from $500 million to $2 billion, to be used to purchase Bitcoin
item.description: On July 24th, as per Bloomberg, Strategy (formerly known as MicroStrategy) intends to expand the scale of its financing from $500 million to $2 billion with the aim of purchasing Bitcoin.

item.title: US Stock Crypto Concept Stocks Mixed, Sharplink Gaming Up 8.87%
item.description: On July 24th, according to the market data of Rockflow, US stock cryptocurrency concept stocks witnessed mixed gains and losses. These include:· Sharplink Gaming increased by 8.87%;· Bitmine went up by 6.29%;· Bitdeer rose by 3.97%;· Strategy rose by 0.19%;· Circle dropped by 5.01%;· Coinbase fell by 0.42%.

item.title: DeFi Development has partnered with the cross-chain transaction protocol Mayan to support cross-chain functionality for DFDVx.
item.description: On July 24th, the financially strategic listed company DeFi Development announced a strategic partnership with Solana's cross-chain trading protocol Mayan. By means of this integration, Mayan now enables the support of DeFi Dev Corp's tokenized equity tool DFDVx for cross-chain and native exchanges, thereby offering seamless access for users across multiple blockchain networks.
